properties.title: Open Pune
properties.description:
Maps of Pune city documenting Environmental Change, Climate and Weather Data, Socio-Economic Data, Critical Infrastructure, Health and More
1. Satellite Imagery from Landsat Series of Satellites, Sentinel, and Commercial
2. Time period: From 1990 to 2023 and Georeferenced Historical Maps
3. Maps to create:
    a) False Color Composites and Indices Maps
    b) Supervised Classified LULC Maps
    c) LULC Classes Quantified Area Table with Accuracy Assessment Table
    d) Elevation Maps from SRTM, Cartosat and ALOS
    e) Relief Maps (3d) of FCC and Classified Maps
    f) Boundary Maps (i) City Limits (ii) Wards of Different Times
    g) Development Plans of Different Times
    h) Climate and Weather Data
    i) Population density and Population demographics
    j) Critical Infrastructure
    k) Health Data - eg. COVID-19 and Breast Cancer
